document_data.caption2: Map showing the Guildhall (labeled C36) on Waterdeep Way.
document_data.name: Guildhall of the Order
document_data.owner: [[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Guildhall of the Order''' was the headquarters of the [[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The guildhall was situated on [[Waterdeep Way]] between the intersections of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and the [[Street of Bells]].
document_data.Structure:
The building itself was large, prosperous-looking, and made of stone. Outside of it stood a large statue of a [[beaver]] with a wooden placard that indicated it was the "Guildhall of the Order."

For much of its existence this guildhall had only one floor, and [[1479 DR]]<ref group="note">The date for all Year 1 RPGA sanctioned adventures is considered to be [[1479 DR]] for the purposes of this wiki. a second story was added to the structure.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Woolmen's Restless Tomb|5}}
